title: The Question With Bite

dialogue.speaker: The Architect
dialogue.text: Now to your real question. The one with bite.
dialogue.context: The AI prepares to address Evan's challenge about whether it's been simplifying its communication

scene_context: Having addressed the philosophical question about subjective perspective, the Architect turns to what it identifies as the more emotionally charged question about condescension.
philosophical_theme: The hierarchy of questions - which ones have intellectual interest versus emotional weight
visual_elements: A question mark with teeth, ready to draw blood
